content.p: Accredited degrees assure students, parents, and employers that the degree meets industry standards and competency levels set by approved accreditation bodies. These bodies play a crucial role in evaluating educational programmes to ensure they meet the quality benchmarks of a specific industry. These are some of the accreditation bodies that have recognised UNM's diverse programmes. Get in touch with our friendly counsellors to find out more about UNM. Find a programme Get in touch Application Guidelines, intake deadlines and student requirements at your fingertips. Explore a diverse range of programmes, from full-time taught degrees to research programmes. Get a full listing of tuition fees for all postgraduate programmes.
